items.name: Corpse Spiral
fracturedMods: 10% increased Life Reservation Efficiency of Skills

socketedItems.secDescrText: Spends a portion of your mana to grant a buff that takes some of the damage from hits for you until depleted. The buff grants added lightning damage based on the amount of mana spent by this skill. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods:
75% of Damage from Hits is taken from Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to Mana Spent by this Skill's effect
Buff grants Added Lightning Damage equal to 15% of Mana Spent by this Skill's effect
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Beast Shot
explicitMods: Adds 10 to 22 Physical Damage to Attacks
Adds 7 to 89 Lightning Damage to Attacks
Bow Attacks fire an additional Arrow

items.name: Agony Pace
enchantMods: You take 10% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes if you've taken a Critical Strike Recently

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants evasion to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 2700 additional Evasion Rating
You and nearby allies gain 30% more Evasion rating
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Cold, Travel, Blink, AoE

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving Chilled ground in an area at both ends of the teleport. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods:
19% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate for each Normal or Magic Enemy in Area
99% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate for each Rare or Unique Enemy in Area
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports aura skills that reserve life or mana to create auras around you.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 25% increased Aura effect

Supported Skills also count as Blessing Skills
You can only have one Aura on you from your Blessing Skills
Your Non-Blessing Skills which Reserve Mana are Disabled while you have an Aura from a Supported Skill on you
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

implicitMods: Curse Enemies with Elemental Weakness on Hit
explicitMods: 2% increased Melee Physical Damage per 10 Dexterity
flavourText: By my hand, the inert is given life.
By my hand, that which rots is reborn.
There is nothing that cannot be changed.
